docs.snippet: The adviser, George Papadopoulos, has pleaded guilty to lying to the F.B.I. about that conversation, according to documents unsealed Monday.

headline.main: Trump Campaign Adviser Met With Russian to Discuss ‘Dirt’ on Clinton

docs.snippet: One of Representative John Conyers Jr.’s accusers appeared on “Today” to explicitly detail her harassment accusations, prompting House leaders to say he should go.

docs.snippet: A media property without a website or reporters? Arm in a sling, the former Trump aide explains his notion.

docs.snippet: The longtime supporter of President Trump lobbed insults at CNN anchors and contributors, leading to a suspension of his Twitter account.

docs.snippet: President Trump’s E.P.A. is fine with children eating food tainted by a pesticide derived from a nerve gas.

docs.snippet: The latest landmark — Dow 24,000 — reflects optimism about rising profits and lower taxes, and a seeming imperviousness to unsettling news.
